Player History
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,188,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/10/1985, off Jesse Orosco (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1985, off Rick Waits (PHI)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,492,857 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/7/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $5,750,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1988, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1989, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
10/14/1989: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $4,250,000 per year, for 2 years.
Drove in 6 runs against New York (Y) on 7/13/1991...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/13/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $3,670,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/12/1992...
